thread.section_title: The Roger - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: karenwtoronto
title: Great location
text: We stayed at the Roger during the March Break with our two teenage boys. The service was excellent. Everyone was very helpful with giving us tips as to where to eat and explore. The room was clean and big enough for the four of us, with a good sized bathroom. The location was excellent as we could walk or take a short cab ride to many great neighborhoods. We would definitely look to book this again. We also got a great deal to book through trip advisor.
